rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0504, 2619, 3189, 3818, 3850, 4412, 4435, B6003, B6004}
Unit was previously coded {AFF4200%, AFF5250%, BFF5250, FIN4200, FIN5200}
Unit was previously coded {AFF4200%, AFF5250%, BFF5250, FIN4200, FIN5200}
(Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 07, 41, 42, 50} and Must be enrolled in course version {0504, 2619, 3189, 3818, 3850, 4412})

description: This unit covers five pillars of corporate treasury management: corporate finance (financing, investment, dividend payout) debt and equity markets and product design liquidity/net working capital management risk transfer, retention and management (exchange rate risk, interest rate risk, credit risk, and loan concentration risk) managing corporate treasury as a strategic unit.
